name: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon Super S: Zenin Sanka!! Shuyaku Soudatsusen
overview: This fighting game is an enhanced version of Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon S: Jougai Ranto!? Shuyaku Soudatsusen. Girls compete against each other in tournament mode, story mode, player-vs.-computer mode, and two players mode. They can use physical attacks and magical spells. In story mode you can also upgrade your fighter's attributes (strength, defense power, etc.) New in this expanded version: additional playable characters (hence the title Zen'in Sanka - "Everyone Participates"), different scenes in story mode, additional backgrounds for battles.
